title: HAP 36 - Sons of Africa - Quobna Ottobah Cugoano and Olaudah Equiano

description: Quobna Ottobah Cugoano and Olaudah Equiano advance the goals of the abolitionist movement through a groundbreaking political treatise and an influential autobiography.
